homepage_intro.html: The design office of Theo Ford. Specialising in graphic design, art direction, moving-image and web development. Recent commissions and collaborations include identities for Tesla, adverts for American Apparel, and printed for matter COS.

about_page_intro.html: Theo Ford is a London–based designer, specialising in graphic design, art direction, moving image and web development. Through a cross disciplinary and collaborative approach, he creates original yet long-lasting design solutions that strike a balance between playful expression and order.
